channel.title: Equipment Null - Help Please!

item.title: Equipment Null - Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

Iâ€™m been working on unlimited-pkz blank server(317) for some time now, and since the beginning there has been 2 nulls, one of which in the equipment(chest) area. The second one is in the equipment(legs) area. I figured it would be rather simple to get rid of a null because I could just delete the current nulls by going to the character list, I also went to player.java and edited that so that the equipment options looks like:

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1; playerEquipment[playerCape]=-1; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerChest]=-1; playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=-1; playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=-1;

As you can see all them are set to have no armor when they start, I also tried 0 instead -1.

Read full topic
